name: report-handler.yml
configuration:
spring:
    data:
        solr:
        host: "http://proxy.art-platform.io:8081/solr"
        username: "solr"
        password: "SolrRocks"
    datasource:
        driver-class-name: org.postgresql.Driver
        jdbc-url: "jdbc:postgresql://postgres-development/ttm_camunda?ApplicationName=nttm-report-handler"
        username: "postgres"
        password: "1"
    jpa:
        database: postgresql
        hibernate:
        ddl-auto: none
    database-platform: org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQL95Dialect
    properties:
        hibernate.session.events.auto: ru.rtkit.nttm.logger.interceptor.JdbcLoggingInterceptor
        hibernate:
            connection:
                release_mode: after_transaction
            temp:
                use_jdbc_metadata_defaults: false
    jackson:
        serialization:
            fail_on_empty_beans: false
        deserialization:
            read_date_timestamps_as_nanoseconds: false
    jmx:
        default-domain: report-handler-app-jmx
    profiles:
        include: reportCellsNames
    application:
        name: nttm-report-handler
    mds-datasource:
        jdbc-url: "jdbc:sqlserver://10.42.43.100;database=MDS_UAT"
        username: "NTTM_reader"
        password: "Ghjkl0987654"
        driver-class-name: com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerDriver
app:
    debugEnabled: true
    jwt:
        expire: ${JWT_EXPIRE:90000000} #90000000ms = 25hrs
        secret: ${JWT_SECRET_KEY:z%C*F-JaNdRgUkXn2r5u8x/A?D(G+KbPeShVmYq3s6v9y&E)H@McQfTjWnZr4h}
        server: http://nttm-auth-jwt-develop:8080/nttm-auth-jwt/api/
    filterReport:
        maxValueResult: "1500"
        privilegeId: 7
    url:
        prefix: http://nttm.development.apps.open-shift.art-platform.io/#/tickets/editticket;id=
import-properties:
    mrfIds: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8
report:
    generaltt:
        totalWaitTime: "Время приостановок, ч"
        ticketDescription: "Описание инцидента"
    tasks:
        subprocessCoordinatorUnit: "Подразделение координатора подпроцесса"
        subprocessCoordinatorFIO: "Координатор подпроцесса (ФИО)"
management:
    endpoints:
        web:
            path-mapping:
                prometheus: metrics
            base-path: /
            exposure:
                include: prometheus
    health.solr.enabled: false
logging:
    config: classpath:log4j2-dev.yaml
    level:
        org.hibernate: error
        org.hibernate.SQL: error
        org.zalando.logbook: info
logbook:
    format:
        style: http
    exclude:
        - "**/metrics"
server:
  port: 8080
  servlet:
    context-path: /nttm-report-handler
